basic.floral_language:
Narcissus cyclamineus 
Floriography: confident, pure, beautiful
Narcissus cyclamineus is extremely graceful, like a river fairy. Two types: China Narcissus and Daffodils. China Narcissus is the official flower of Zhangzhou City in China.
Chinese narcissus has white flowers, yellow bowl-shaped paracorolla (inner corolla), rich scent. Flowers in winter. Daffodils have many varieties, with varied inner corolla shapes, lighter and elegant scent, bloom normally in April-May.
Narcissus likes sunshine, also resistant to half shade, period of flower viewing 2-3 weeks. After flowering, leave the bulbs for sprouting in the coming year, may normally blossom for years.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-April, viewing period 1-2 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, resistant to half shade, dormant in summer under high temperature
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, reduce watering during flowering season, 1-2 times a week
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year
